overview: A girl and her fiancé are on their way to a party on New Year's Eve when their car has an accident, and they find nowhere to go except a strange castle. They are met there by many vampires, led by count Dracula, who instantly falls in love with the girl and wants her for himself. The two lovers discover that Dracula is in Egypt in many forms (doctor, taxi driver, plumber, etc.) not to suck people's blood but to suck their money, as a typical modern profiteer.
title: Fangs
